file_content.text: Sorry we're late! You're gonna want to time this just right...
We're not gonna clear the planet in time.
Don't wait! Punch it!
We have lost contact with the pursuit vessels on Iokath.
But did they catch the Gravestone?
The enemy vessel escaped.
Leave us.
Can you reprogram all the GEMINIs like you did her?
I only require a connection.
I can arrange that.
There's nothing like a long vacation to make you appreciate coming home.
This isn't my home. Not anymore.
You can stay on Odessen, Koth. Earn back our trust.
It could be again.
I see how everyone looks at me. The trust isn't just broken. It's destroyed.
It's a big galaxy. Someday you'll find a place where you can start over.
You'll find a new one.
Yeah. Someday.
You don't belong anywhere, Koth. That's what happens when you betray me.
Traitors don't have homes.
I don't think I ever really belonged here.
You spared my life, Commander. The best way I can repay the Alliance is to disappear.
I don't know what it'll take to stop Vaylin and save Zakuul, but I hope you find it.
The Gravestone is back where it belongs. You've earned a moment's rest.
We had to take the scenic route, but we're home--and so's the Gravestone.
Look at that. They saved our favorite parking space.
The best part about leaving home is coming back. I say we take the rest of the week off.
What a relief.
You've certainly earned it.
Broadcast a message to the HoloNet. Make sure everyone knows we're alive and well.
Tell the galaxy we're back.
Smart. We don't need another Saresh trying to replace you.
I want a patrol fleet in the Iokath system at all times. That world belongs to me.
Send scouts back to Iokath.
Of course. In the meantime, try to enjoy being home.
I'll prepare an Alliance status report. Find me when you're ready for the debrief.
